name: Fhaloness
description:
In the land of Matricia, at the home of Court Fhaldir Cedric, something is afoot...

Join Fabian, a young 19 year old Fhaldir (sort-of like a druid) as he must unravel a deadly mystery in his own home. Will you solve the mystery and put Fabian on the path of a greater adventure?

(Short adventure game, completable in approximately 15 minutes)

This game was created as part of the Monthly Adventure Game Studio (MAGS) competition. This competition means a game has to be created during one month. I'm currently considering expanding this game and adding multiple episodes to it... so this might, at some point, be rebranded as the "Prologue".
